column1: Another  main  contention  of  the  Petitioner  is  that  the  charge  sheet  marked  'P5'  is  ex  facie
defective due to the following purported technical errors:

column2: Omitting to mention the date and time of the offence in the charge sheet.
No document has been attached to the charge sheet to establish the fact that the
Petitioner had worked at the 'Rasa FM' radio station.
The  frequency  modulation  (FM)  or  the  date  and  time  when  the  alleged
commentary was aired have not been mentioned.
